ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lindfmm.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 2 |  | lindfmm.c | |- C = ( Base ` T ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( G e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ G : B -1-1-> C /\ F e. ( LIndS ` S ) ) -> F e. ( LIndS ` S ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_linds1 | |- ( F e. ( LIndS ` S ) -> F C_ B ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_lindsmm | |- ( ( G e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ G : B -1-1-> C /\ F C_ B ) -> ( F e. ( LIndS ` S ) <-> ( G " F ) e. ( LIndS ` T ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl3an3 | |- ( ( G e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ G : B -1-1-> C /\ F e. ( LIndS ` S ) ) -> ( F e. ( LIndS ` S ) <-> ( G " F ) e. ( LIndS ` T ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( G e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ G : B -1-1-> C /\ F e. ( LIndS ` S ) ) -> ( G " F ) e. ( LIndS ` T ) ) |
